changeSet.author: netposa
changeSet.sql: 注册实体 CREATE TABLE `register` ( `ID` varchar(36) NOT NULL COMMENT '', `DeviceID` varchar(36) COMMENT '', `IP` varchar(36) COMMENT '', `Port` varchar(36) COMMENT '', `UserName` varchar(36) COMMENT '', `Password` varchar(36) COMMENT '', `RegisterTime` date COMMENT '' , `CancelTime` date COMMENT '', `KeepAliveTime` integer COMMENT '', `Status` varchar(100) COMMENT '', PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
